mapper.select: select a.* ,b.nickname ,b.pro_path from COMMENTS a left outer join users b on a.user_id = b.user_id order by comment_id

select a.* ,b.* ,CASE WHEN j.cmt_like_ud IS NOT NULL THEN j.cmt_like_ud ELSE 0 END AS comment_like_state from COMMENTS a left outer join users b on a.user_id = b.user_id left outer join comment_like j ON a.comment_id = j.comment_id and j.user_id = #{user_id} where a.pa_comment_id = #{comment_id} order by a.create_date
select * from comment_like where comment_id = #{comment_id} and user_id = #{user_id} and board_id = #{board_id}
